mapper.insert: insert into warehouse_input_sheet (id, batch_id, operator, create_time, purchase_sheet_id, state) values (#{id},#{batchId},#{operator},#{createTime},#{purchaseSheetId},#{state})
mapper.update: update warehouse_input_sheet set batch_id = #{batchId}, operator = #{operator}, create_time = #{createTime}, purchase_sheet_id = #{purchaseSheetId}, `state` = #{state} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from warehouse_input_sheet order by id desc limit 0,1 ;

insert into warehouse_input_sheet_content (wi_id, pid, quantity, purchase_price, production_date, remark) values
(#{item.wiId},#{item.pid},#{item.quantity},#{item.purchasePrice},#{item.productionDate},#{item.remark})
mapper.select: (select "warehouse_input"as type, p.id as sheet_id,pr.name as product_name, c.name as category_name,pc.quantity as quantity,pc.unit_price as unit_price,pc.total_price as total_price,p.create_time as create_time from purchase_sheet p,purchase_sheet_content pc,product pr,category c where p.state='审批完成' and p.id=pc.purchase_sheet_id and pc.pid=pr.id and pr.category_id=c.id and p.create_time>= #{beginTime} and p.create_time <= #{endTime}) union all (select "warehouse_output" as type,s.id as sheet_id,pr.name as product_name, c.name as category_name,sc.quantity as quantity,sc.unit_price as unit_price,sc.total_price as total_price, s.create_time as create_time from sale_sheet s,sale_sheet_content sc,product pr,category c where s.state='审批完成' and s.id=sc.sale_sheet_id and sc.pid=pr.id and pr.category_id=c.id and s.create_time>=#{beginTime} and s.create_time <=#{endTime}) order by create_time;
